description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years.
The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his son.
When the menace known as the Joker emerges, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological tests.
A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology.
The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, and other historical events unfold through the perspective of Forrest Gump.
